EmailTemplate.name: NRRC_EmailTemplate_Manual_WorkItem
EmailTemplate.Body:
Hello Team,
A manual work item has been generated due to validation issues while processing the onboarding steps for:
Identity: $!identityDisplayName
------------------------------------------------------------ Work Item Details ------------------------------------------------------------ Work Item Name : $!workItemName Assigned To : $!workItemOwner Work Item Link : $!workItemLink ------------------------------------------------------------
Please review the work item and complete the required validation to continue the onboarding process.
Thank you, Identity Management Team
EmailTemplate.Description: Email notification sent when manual work item is created due to validation issues.

Argument.name: identityDisplayName
Argument.Description: The name of the identity for which validation failed.

Argument.name: workItemOwner
Argument.Description: The group or owner responsible for the work item.

Argument.name: workItemName
Argument.Description: The name of the generated work item.

Argument.name: workItemLink
Argument.Description: Direct link to the work item.

EmailTemplate.Subject: Action Required: Manual Validation Needed for $!identityDisplayName
